scripts.start: concurrently "cd packages/server && npm run dev" "cd packages/client && npm run dev"
scripts.start:host: concurrently "cd packages/server && npm start" "cd packages/client && npm run dev:host"
scripts.debug: concurrently "cd packages/server && npm debug" "cd packages/client && npm run dev:host"
scripts.postinstall: (cd packages/server && npm install); (cd packages/client && npm install)
